content: absolutely adorable pattern live a dream will not let you to get bored it has many different textured stitches that create this beautiful blanket the pattern will look gorgeous using not only few different solid colors but also ombre one solid color cakes or long gradient yarn you can use this pattern to create a baby blanket or lap blanket or you can join squares together to create a stunning king size bed cover **this pattern is now available as a free download ** the pattern is appropriate for the intermediate level crocheters for more experienced ones this would be a relaxing project the pattern includes detailed descriptions stitch guide video tutorial pictures after every few rounds and to demonstrate the final result i invite you to join the crochet patterns by bebablanket 1 facebook group where you can find the picture of the pattern after each round **stitches ** magic_ring surface slip_stitch slip_stitch single_crochet back top single_crochet back loop only single_crochet front post single_crochet half_double_crochet back top half_double_crochet double_crochet back post double_crochet front loop only double_crochet front post extended double_crochet popcorn **yarn colors hook & approximate size ** live a dream pattern sample was created using #3 yarn light weight/dk 100 % acrylic hook size 4 5 mm pink 50 g 130 m/142 yd rose 50 g 130 m/142 yd dirty pink 50g 130m/142 yd pink variegated alize burcum batik 100 g 210 m/230 yd purple shades 3 colors light purple 100 g 210 m/230 yd purple 50 g 130 m/142 yd plum 50 g 130 m/142 yd total 450 g 1070 m /1170 yd the sample size 42 rounds including border = 30 in 75 cm square before blocking you can make a blanket bigger by adding the repeated rounds at the end you can use any yarn & hook you like that suits your project **26th march 2019 added new extended variation of the pattern** now you can crochet as big square as you want by continuing the pattern not just plain rounds extended variation no 2 added 26/03/2019 continuing repeating the pattern not plain rounds round 38 - repeat round 18 just in the corner spaces make 3dc ch2 3dc instead of 2dc ch2 2dc in the corner and 1 double_crochet in ch1 space that we had after and before corner pop on round 18 round 39 - repeat round 19 round 40 - repeat round 20 round 41 - repeat round 21 the next set of rounds will be 42-45 on round 42 we reduce amount of shells -1 on each side of the square as we did on round 22 continue the logic of the pattern till you are happy about the size of your blanket 1 https //www facebook com/groups/bebablanketpatterns
